Ruling: Fetus can be referred to as ‘unborn human being’ in Arizona abortion measure voter pamphlet  —  An informational pamphlet for Arizona voters who will decide in the fall whether to guarantee a constitutional right to an abortion can refer to a fetus as an “unborn human being,” the state's highest court ruled Wednesday.
